00034 #ifndef __Plane_H__

00041 namespace Ogre {
00042 
00053     class _OgreExport Plane
00054     {
00055     public:
00058         Plane ();
00059         Plane (const Plane& rhs);
00061         Plane (const Vector3& rkNormal, Real fConstant);
00063         Plane (Real a, Real b, Real c, Real d);
00064         Plane (const Vector3& rkNormal, const Vector3& rkPoint);
00065         Plane (const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1,
00066             const Vector3& rkPoint2);
00067 
00072         enum Side
00073         {
00074             NO_SIDE,
00075             POSITIVE_SIDE,
00076             NEGATIVE_SIDE,
00077             BOTH_SIDE
00078         };
00079 
00080         Side getSide (const Vector3& rkPoint) const;
00081 
00086         Side getSide (const AxisAlignedBox& rkBox) const;
00087 
00097         Side getSide (const Vector3& centre, const Vector3& halfSize) const;
00098 
00107         Real getDistance (const Vector3& rkPoint) const;
00108 
00110         void redefine(const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1,
00111             const Vector3& rkPoint2);
00112 
00114         void redefine(const Vector3& rkNormal, const Vector3& rkPoint);
00115 
00123         Vector3 projectVector(const Vector3& v) const;
00124 
00134         Real normalise(void);
00135 
00136         Vector3 normal;
00137         Real d;
00138 
00140         bool operator==(const Plane& rhs) const
00141         {
00142             return (rhs.d == d && rhs.normal == normal);
00143         }
00144         bool operator!=(const Plane& rhs) const
00145         {
00146             return (rhs.d != d && rhs.normal != normal);
00147         }
00148 
00149         _OgreExport friend std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& o, const Plane& p);
00150     };
00151 
00152     typedef std::vector<Plane> PlaneList;
